paragraphs.body: The Legend So Far is an eleven-minute-long recap episode of ${link_0} narrated by ${link_1}, the voice of ${link_2} ${link_3}. It originally aired on November 18, 2005, on ${link_4}. In this recap, Roku retells some of the events that have occurred in ${link_5}'s journey before episode eighteen, "${link_6}", and provides a sneak peek of the episodes still to come. It served as an introduction to the three-part ${link_7} finale, which began with the episode "The Waterbending Master".
paragraphs.text: The Legend So Far is an eleven-minute-long recap episode of Avatar: The Last Airbender narrated by James Garrett, the voice of Avatar Roku. It originally aired on November 18, 2005, on Nickelodeon. In this recap, Roku retells some of the events that have occurred in Aang's journey before episode eighteen, "The Waterbending Master", and provides a sneak peek of the episodes still to come. It served as an introduction to the three-part Book One finale, which began with the episode "The Waterbending Master".

paragraphs.body: Writers: David P. Lewin, Maria Lokken
paragraphs.text: Writers: David P. Lewin, Maria Lokken
